data.system_settings: Macbook Pro Retina 15-inch Mid 2015, OS X El Capitan 10.11.6
data.actual_result: Clicking the link only jumps to channel, it doesn't scroll to message. If the link was posted in the same channel than the blocked message, clicking the link does absolutely nothing
data.expected_result: I've been told that message links are still supposed to work even if the author of the message is a user you've blocked
data.short_description: Clicking a message link does not work properly if the author of this message is a user you've blocked
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message from any user - Copy share message link - Block the user - Paste the link in any chat and click it
